column1: Tenant shall be responsible for payment of all electricity bills.
The security deposit of $1000 will be returned within 30 days of lease termination.
Tenant shall have the option to renew this lease for an additional term of one year.
All electrical usage shall be billed directly to the tenant on a monthly basis.
Upon termination of the lease, the security deposit will be returned minus any damages.
To exercise renewal rights, tenant must provide written notice 60 days before lease expiration.
